caption.p: The temperature dependence of ( a) the ab-plane resistivity ρ ab and ( b) the c-axis resistivity ρ c, and ( c) the enlarged ρ ab and ρ c for x = 0.34 single crystal. The temperature dependence of ( d) the ab-plane resistivity ρ ab and ( e) the c-axis resistivity ρ c for x = 0.41 single crystal, and ( f) the anisotropy ρ c/ρ ab. The insets for both ( a, b, d) and ( e) show the replot of ρ ab(T) and ρ c(T), and fitting curves (red) according to the thermal activation model ρ = ρ 0exp(Δ/ κ BT).
